DerivedAttribute.name: languageSpoken
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE WHEN ((Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_2__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_3__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_4__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey) AND (LENGTH(User.LanguageLocaleKey) = 2 OR User.LanguageLocaleKey in ('zh_CN', 'en_US'))) THEN LOWER(substr(User.LanguageLocaleKey, 1, 2)) WHEN ((Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_2__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_3__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_4__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey) AND User.LanguageLocaleKey in ('zh_TW','nl_NL','pt_BR','es_MX','en_GB','pt_PT')) THEN LOWER(substr(User.LanguageLocaleKey, 4, 5)) WHEN ((Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c = 'en' OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_2__c = 'en' OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_3__c = 'en' OR Sales_Organization__c.Language_4__c = 'en') AND User.LanguageLocaleKey = 'en_US') THEN 'en' WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c in ('zh_CN', 'en_US') THEN LOWER(substr(Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c, 1, 2)) WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c in ('zh_TW','nl_NL','pt_BR','es_MX','en_GB','pt_PT') THEN LOWER(substr(Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c, 4, 5)) ELSE Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c END

DerivedAttribute.name: distanceUnit
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Distance_Unit__c = 'km' THEN 'kilometers' ELSE Sales_Organization__c.Distance_Unit__c END

DerivedAttribute.name: sfLanguagePostfix
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey Then 'Language_1' WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_2__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey Then 'Language_2' WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_3__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey Then 'Language_3' WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_4__c = User.LanguageLocaleKey Then 'Language_4' WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_1__c = 'en' AND User.LanguageLocaleKey = 'en_US' Then 'Language_1' WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_2__c = 'en' AND User.LanguageLocaleKey = 'en_US' Then 'Language_2' WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_3__c = 'en' AND User.LanguageLocaleKey = 'en_US' Then 'Language_3' WHEN Sales_Organization__c.Language_4__c = 'en' AND User.LanguageLocaleKey = 'en_US' Then 'Language_4' ELSE 'Language_1' END
